translation: translated by imperial edict of the Great Tang Tripitaka Master Bodhiruci奉

source_sentence: 被甲莊嚴會第七之一
translation: The Seventh Part of the Assembly on the Adornment of Armor

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時佛住王舍城迦蘭陀竹林，與大比丘眾及諸菩薩摩訶薩俱，
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, when the Buddha was staying at Kalandaka’s Grove in Rājagaha, accompanied by a great assembly of monks and bodhisattva-mahasattvas,

source_sentence: 悉從種種佛剎來集。
translation: They all come from various buddha bases.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，無量百千眾所圍遶供養恭敬。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān was surrounded by measureless hundreds of thousands of people who offered support and respect.

source_sentence: 時彼眾中有菩薩摩訶薩名無邊慧，即從坐起，偏袒右肩右膝著地，稽首作禮合掌向佛，
translation: Among those in the assembly, there was a bodhisattva Mahāsattva named Infinite Wisdom who rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, knelt with his right knee on the ground, paid homage, joined his palms and faced the Buddha.

source_sentence: 白言：「世尊！
translation: He said, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我有少疑請問如來，願垂聽許為我宣說。」
translation: I have a few doubts to ask the Tathāgata, so please listen and allow me to explain them.

source_sentence: 「大雄大丈夫，　　世間無與等，
translation: Great hero, the great hero, There is no equal in the world.

source_sentence: 我為眾生故，　　少疑當請問。
translation: For the sake of sentient beings, I'll ask questions with few doubts.

source_sentence: 不起師子座，　　現身遍十方，
translation: Not rising from his lion seat, he manifests his body in all ten directions.

source_sentence: 一切異論中，　　無能傾動者，
translation: In all the different theories, There is no one who can overturn them.

source_sentence: 智藏無邊際，　　諸力無有量，
translation: The store of knowledge has no bounds; Their powers are immeasurable.

source_sentence: 世尊一一力，　　普能度世間，
translation: The World-honored One’s power is one by one able to save all beings in the world.

source_sentence: 善住一切智，　　善住於十力，
translation: He well abides in omniscience, well abiding in the ten powers,

source_sentence: 無畏大師子，　　最勝無上尊，
translation: The fearless great lion, the supreme and highest honored one,

source_sentence: 十八不共法，　　如來之所有，
translation: The eighteen unique qualities Which belong to the enlightened,

source_sentence: 照明於世間，　　摧伏諸外道，
translation: He illuminates the world, overpowers non-Buddhist teachings, and destroys heretics.

source_sentence: 了知一切法，　　是故無過上，
translation: Knowing all things, Therefore there is nothing superior.

source_sentence: 無失大導師，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Without losing the great teacher, I doubt that I will ask questions.

source_sentence: 無邊離垢智，　　大海不動智，
translation: Boundless, undefiled wisdom that’s boundless, Immutable as the great ocean.

source_sentence: 境界無礙智，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Unhindered cognition of the objective realm, I doubt it and will ask questions.

source_sentence: 世尊善修集，　　於道無疑惑，
translation: The World-honored One well cultivates the practice of collecting, Without doubt or doubt regarding the path.

source_sentence: 安隱大導師，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Great Guide Anyin, I doubt that I should ask questions.

source_sentence: 已度諸暴流，　　已斷諸結縛，
translation: Having crossed the violent currents, They have cut off all bonds.

source_sentence: 能拔眾毒箭，　　我疑當請問。
translation: If you can pull out all the poisonous arrows, I doubt it and will ask questions.

source_sentence: 已破無明[穀-禾+卵]，　　已息煩惱熱，
translation: Having destroyed ignorance, He has extinguished the fever of afflictions.

source_sentence: 清涼善安住，　　我疑當請問。
translation: They are cool and well-abiding, and I doubt that I should ask questions.

source_sentence: 無畏無上智，　　無著無礙智，
translation: Fearless, supreme knowledge, Unattached, unhindered knowledge.

source_sentence: 法海一切智，　　如來已證得。
translation: The ocean of all knowledge of the teachings has been realized by the enlightened.

source_sentence: 佛無量功德，　　智證悉圓滿，
translation: Buddha’s immeasurable virtue Is completely fulfilled by knowledge and realization.

source_sentence: 盡一切有漏，　　破諸煩惱見。
translation: To extinguish all the contaminants, he destroys the views of afflictions.

source_sentence: 世尊多積集，　　無量大功德，
translation: The World-honored One has accumulated innumerable great merits.

source_sentence: 不思議法王，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Inconceivable is the king of the Dharma, and I doubt that I should ask questions.

source_sentence: 世尊殊勝智，　　普能照世間，
translation: The World-honored One’s supreme knowledge Is able to illuminate the world everywhere.

source_sentence: 演暢法光明，　　無邊功德海。
translation: He spreads the light of the Teaching, Boundless is his ocean of virtue.

source_sentence: 導師法光故，　　遍照於世間，
translation: Because of the Guide’s illumination of truth, They illumine all beings everywhere in the world.

source_sentence: 是故世間中，　　佛法光明現。
translation: For this reason the light of the buddha-dharma appears in the world.

source_sentence: 法海一切智，　　辯才無有上，
translation: The ocean of all truths is omniscience, Unsurpassed in its eloquence.

source_sentence: 精進不思議，　　清淨離諸見。
translation: Their effort is inconceivable, pure and free of views.

source_sentence: 佛眼無邊故，　　智境亦無邊，
translation: Because the Buddha’s eye has no limit, The sphere of knowledge also has no limit.

source_sentence: 世間無等尊，　　我疑當請問。
translation: World-Honored One, there is no equal in the world. I have doubts and will ask questions.

source_sentence: 法王大牟尼，　　能斷眾生惑，
translation: Great sage, the king of the Dharma, Can cut off the afflictions of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 導師我當問，　　願隨其意樂。
translation: Guide, I will ask you questions, Please follow your wishes.

source_sentence: 我觀一切處，　　天上及人間，
translation: I observe all places, the heavens and humans.

source_sentence: 無有等如來，　　普遍照明者。
translation: There's no equal Tathāgata who universally illuminates.

source_sentence: 善住諸功德，　　莊嚴大丈夫，
translation: Well-abiding in virtue, Adorned as a great hero,

source_sentence: 不思議法王，　　仙中照曜者。
translation: He's the inconceivable king of the Dharma, the sage who shines brightly.

source_sentence: 譬如大雪山，　　眾寶端嚴處，
translation: It's like the great snowy mountain, a place of many treasures and adornment.

source_sentence: 世尊安法座，　　端嚴亦如是。
translation: The World-honored One has set up the seat of Dharma, And so is his dignified appearance.

source_sentence: 妙音大精進，　　能宣悅意聲，
translation: Their wondrous sound is great energy, Able to proclaim the voice of their minds.

source_sentence: 眾生若得聞，　　善根悉清淨。
translation: If sentient beings hear it, their good roots are all pure.

source_sentence: 世尊人中勝，　　時演法光明，
translation: Bhagavān, the best among men, occasionally manifests the light of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 以是諸眾生，　　隨意便開覺。
translation: Because of these sentient beings, they can then awaken as they wish.

source_sentence: 知時知眾會，　　知人大導師，
translation: Knowing the time, he knows the assemblies. He knows the leaders of the great assembly.

source_sentence: 敷演法光明，　　以時智慧者。
translation: He spreads out the light of the teaching and uses his wisdom at the right time.

source_sentence: 梵音大精進，　　願賜清淨言，
translation: Greatly zealous is the Sanskrit sound, Please give it pure speech.

source_sentence: 如天雨大地，　　法潤遍霑洽。
translation: Like the heavens raining rain on the earth, The Dharma nourishes and pervades everywhere.

source_sentence: 世尊處眾會，　　普宣法雨已，
translation: The World-honored One remained in the assembly, Having universally proclaimed the rain of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 於此法悕望，　　眾生皆滿足。
translation: The longing for this teaching is fulfilled by sentient beings.

source_sentence: 最上勝安住，　　如王處妙高，
translation: The highest and most excellent abode is like the king’s place, Sublime and lofty.

source_sentence: 惠施諸眾生，　　能令眾歡喜。
translation: Giving kindness to sentient beings can cause them to rejoice.

source_sentence: 大雄兩足尊，　　不思議境界，
translation: The great hero, the two-legged honored one, Is inconceivable sphere.

source_sentence: 一切諸眾生，　　無有能知者。
translation: All sentient beings have no one who can know.

source_sentence: 無量大丈夫，　　眾會已和合，
translation: Countless great men Have already harmonized the assemblies.

source_sentence: 依怙大牟尼，　　志求佛境界。
translation: Relying on the great sage Śāriputra, he sets out to seek the buddha-realm.

source_sentence: 我於佛境界，　　發趣故來集，
translation: In the realm of buddhahood, I assembled because I had set out for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 導師無礙智，　　如何疾開覺。
translation: Unhindered knowledge of the Guide, How can he quickly awaken?

source_sentence: 我隨其意樂，　　瞻顏欲請問，
translation: According to their wishes, I looked at my face and wanted to ask questions.

source_sentence: 世尊願開示，　　為斷諸疑惑。
translation: The Bhagavat wishes to reveal it In order to remove doubt and confusion.

source_sentence: 若聞無上法，　　便得心歡喜，
translation: If someone hears the highest teaching, They’ll attain mental joy.

source_sentence: 踊躍充遍身，　　能斷眾疑網。
translation: They dance and fill their bodies, Able to cut off the web of doubt.

source_sentence: 法王無上尊，　　一切智無畏，
translation: The king of the Dharma, the supreme honored one, With omniscience and fearlessness,

source_sentence: 一切知見者，　　我疑當請問。
translation: All those who know and see, I'll ask questions about doubt.

source_sentence: 佛於一切法，　　無有少疑惑，
translation: The Buddha has no little doubt In regard to any teaching.

source_sentence: 精進大導師，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Great Guide of energy, I doubt that I should ask questions.

source_sentence: 無上斷疑者，　　於法不疑惑，
translation: The unsurpassed one who stops doubting doesn’t doubt the teaching,

source_sentence: 無邊功德海，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Boundless is the ocean of virtue, which I doubt will ask questions.

source_sentence: 無邊大光明，　　無邊大功德，
translation: Boundless great light, Boundless great virtue,

source_sentence: 無邊清淨智，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Boundless pure wisdom, I doubt it and will ask questions.

source_sentence: 無邊精進智，　　無邊境界智，
translation: Boundless knowledge of effort, Boundless knowledge of objects, Boundless knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 無邊饒益智，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Boundlessly enriching wisdom, I doubt it and will ask questions.

source_sentence: 世尊無邊智，　　離邊及無邊，
translation: The Bhagavat’s boundless wisdom Is free from extremes and beyond extremes.

source_sentence: 能斷一切疑，　　我疑當請問。
translation: Being able to stop all doubts, I will ask questions about my doubts.

source_sentence: 不思議法王，　　垂哀聽我問，
translation: The inconceivable king of the Dharma, Please have mercy on me and listen to my questions.

source_sentence: 見許我當問，　　牟尼為宣說。
translation: If you allow me to ask questions, the Muni will explain them for you.

source_sentence: 請問一切智，　　釋迦名稱尊，
translation: He asks all the wise, honored as the name of the Śākyamuni,

source_sentence: 若垂聽許我，　　願決我疑網。」
translation: If you listen to me, please resolve my doubts and net of doubt.

source_sentence: 爾時無邊慧菩薩摩訶薩而說偈言：爾時世尊告無邊慧菩薩摩訶薩言：「無邊慧！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Boundless Wisdom spoke these verses, saying, The Bhagavān addressed the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Boundless Wisdom, saying, Boundless Wisdom!

source_sentence: 汝今於我渴仰志求，欲於如來幾何所問？
translation: What do you want to ask the Tathāgata?

source_sentence: 若有問者，我當解說。」
translation: If there's a question, I will explain it.

source_sentence: 「告無邊慧，　　汝欲何問，　　悉應問之，
translation: “Headed by boundless wisdom, Whatever questions you want to ask, You should ask them.

source_sentence: 我當解說。　　如彼所問，　　一一發明，
translation: I will explain it one by one, just as they asked.

source_sentence: 隨其樂欲，　　速為開示。　　我為汝說，
translation: Following their inclinations and desires, I will quickly show them to you.

source_sentence: 一切無疑，　　如汝志求，　　稱汝所問。
translation: All of them are without doubt, just as you wish, and I praise what you ask.

source_sentence: 汝今時問，　　如時如義，　　以時問故，
translation: When you ask this question at the right time, As it is asked at the right time and according to its meaning, It is because you ask at the right time.

source_sentence: 我決定說。　　如汝意樂，　　問所應問，
translation: I will answer with certainty, just as you wish.

source_sentence: 我皆隨順，　　為汝說之。　　汝今時問，
translation: I will follow them and explain them to you.

source_sentence: 我亦時說，　　斷汝疑網，　　當得無疑。
translation: I'll also say, cut off your web of doubt, and you'll attain freedom from doubt.

source_sentence: 我為法王，　　了義究竟，　　於一切法，
translation: I am the king of the Dharma, comprehending ultimate meaning. In all things,

source_sentence: 得無疑惑。　　我於諸法，　　正覺難思，
translation: They attain the absence of doubt and doubt. I am correctly enlightened with regard to all things, but it is difficult to fathom.

source_sentence: 如眾生意，　　所問為說。　　我於諸法，
translation: In the same way I explain all the teachings for you, just as they are explained to you.

source_sentence: 悉無有疑，　　時而問者，　　速當為說。
translation: There's no doubt at all, and those who ask questions at the right time will quickly explain it for them.

source_sentence: 我時為說，　　無有疑惑，　　如其意樂，
translation: I then explained it for them, Without any doubt or doubt. According to their wishes,

source_sentence: 釋彼所疑。　　我常了知，　　時及眾會，
translation: I always know the time and the assemblies.

source_sentence: 諸眾生等，　　意趣所同。　　亦常觀察，
translation: All sentient beings, etc., Are the same as each other in their mental patterns; They also always observe:

source_sentence: 一切眾生，　　有欲無欲，　　彼皆明見。
translation: All sentient beings, With desire or no desire, They clearly see.

source_sentence: 若有智者，　　能善修行，　　我皆以時，
translation: If there are wise people who can skillfully practice, I will do so at the right time.

source_sentence: 正法開悟。　　若無智者，　　愚癡迷亂，
translation: If someone lacks knowledge, They’ll be deluded and confused.

source_sentence: 彼無慧明，　　不尊重法。　　若無尊重，
translation: They lack wisdom and insight And don’t respect the Dharma.

source_sentence: 於法不求，　　雖聞此法，　　無大明智。
translation: They don't seek the teaching, and even though they hear this teaching, they lack great insight.

source_sentence: 法善巧者，　　於法希求，　　若聞此法，
translation: A skillful practitioner of the Dharma seeks the Dharma, and if he hears this teaching,

source_sentence: 得大明智。　　樂大乘者，　　求人中尊，
translation: Those who take delight in the Great Vehicle And attain great insight and knowledge Will seek the honored Ones of the highest rank.

source_sentence: 聞斯法已，　　得大明智。　　佛無上智，
translation: Having heard these teachings, They attain great knowledge and wisdom. The Buddha’s unexcelled knowledge

source_sentence: 不思議智，　　而發趣者，　　聞皆滿足。
translation: The inconceivable wisdom that arouses the aspiration for enlightenment is fulfilled by hearing.

source_sentence: 樂無礙智，　　求最上尊，　　彼聞此法，
translation: They delight in unhindered knowledge And seek supreme honor. When they hear this teaching,

source_sentence: 得大饒益。　　若有智性，　　求不思議，
translation: If one has the nature of wisdom and seeks inconceivable benefits,

source_sentence: 彼聞此法，　　得無上智。　　若有眾生，
translation: If there are sentient beings who hear this teaching, They’ll attain the highest knowledge.

source_sentence: 求佛道場，　　轉無上輪，　　得法歡喜。
translation: Seeking the Buddha's site of enlightenment, he turns the unsurpassed wheel and attains the joy of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 愛樂精進，　　於法尊崇，　　聞離垢法，
translation: They are fond of effort, honored by the teachings, and hear the pure Dharma.

source_sentence: 欣然踊躍。　　若有眾生，　　樂善修習，
translation: If there are any sentient beings Who delight in cultivating well-being,

source_sentence: 以法光明，　　說無上法。　　荷諸重擔，
translation: Because of the light of the teaching, He teaches the supreme teaching.

source_sentence: 無邊策修，　　彼聞法已，　　歡喜充滿。
translation: Boundlessly encouraging and cultivating, they hear the teaching and are filled with joy after hearing it.

source_sentence: 若有希願，　　善法思惟，　　於彼慈哀，
translation: If someone has a wish, they should think of the good Dharma and be compassionate toward them.

source_sentence: 為之開釋。　　哀愍汝等，　　隨汝所問，
translation: I have compassion for you, and whatever questions you may ask,

source_sentence: 我能決定，　　當斷汝疑。　　我多千歲，
translation: I will be able to make up my mind with certainty, And you will have your doubts removed.

source_sentence: 修行善巧，　　疑惑已除，　　知汝意樂。
translation: Cultivating skillful means, Having removed doubt and confusion, I know your intentions.

source_sentence: 若有疑者，　　恣汝所問，　　當為汝說，
translation: If you have doubts, I will explain them to you as freely as you ask.

source_sentence: 斷諸疑惑。　　若有疑者，　　恣汝所問，
translation: If you have doubts, Free yourself from them by asking questions.

source_sentence: 如其樂欲，　　我當說之。　　若有疑者，
translation: I will explain them according to their desires and pleasures.

source_sentence: 恣汝所問，　　我住於法，　　得無動搖。」
translation: Whatever you ask, I'll abide in the Dharma and attain it without moving.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊而說偈言：爾時無邊慧菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke a verse, saying, At that point, the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Boundless Wisdom said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如來、應、正遍知，我於菩薩乘中少有所疑，今當請問。
translation: The Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, I have few doubts about the bodhisattva vehicle, and now I'll ask questions.

source_sentence: 何等善丈夫遠離於怖畏一心正念，為諸眾生被大甲冑，於大甲冑而莊嚴之，
translation: “World-honored One, what kind of noble sons and daughters are free from fearlessness, singlemindedly and with one-pointedly engaged in right mindfulness? For the sake of sentient beings they wear great armor, adorning themselves with great armor.

source_sentence: 起大愛樂而尊重之，以不放逸乘此大乘，以大清淨平正之道，無諸堆阜瓦石荊棘眾惡雜穢、諸見稠林，
translation: They give rise to great delight and venerate them, riding the great vehicle without laziness in this great vehicle, following the great path of purity and equanimity, with no mounds, stones, rocks, thorns, or any other filthy dirt or thicket of views.

source_sentence: 亦無毒刺苦惱坑陷，亦無繫執怖懼艱難。
translation: There's no poisonous thorn, painful pit, or trapping, and no fetters, attachment, fear, or difficulty.

source_sentence: 正直無曲如理平道、無障礙道，剪諸稠林、裂一切網、遠離黑闇、蠲除愛著，
translation: They are upright, straightforward, unbending as the principle is, on a level path and an unobstructed path. They cut down thick forests, split all the webs of attachment, were far removed from darkness, and overcame craving.

source_sentence: 捨和合故而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提？
translation: Because of the conjunction of equanimity, they give rise to the aspiration for supreme perfect enlightenment?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如來、應、正遍知，我於此義故致斯問。
translation: The Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, I ask this question because of this meaning.

source_sentence: 何等善丈夫？
translation: What's a good man?

source_sentence: 何等大甲冑？
translation: What's the great armor?

source_sentence: 被此甲冑乘於大乘，以斯大道而當發趣。
translation: Putting on this armor, he rides the great vehicle, and with this great path, he'll set out for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 應說諸菩薩摩訶薩甲冑莊嚴，安住於道、安住諸法理趣善巧，於法理趣住善巧故，
translation: It should be said that the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and armor-adorned bodhisattvas abide in the path and they abide in the skillfulness of the principles and ways of dharmas because they abide skillfully in the principles and ways of dharmas.

source_sentence: 而能起於諸法理趣善巧光明。
translation: He's able to give rise to the skillful illumination of the principles and destinies of all dharmas.

source_sentence: 法光明故不捨甲冑，乘於大乘，以不退轉精進之力、無忘念根、相續慧力，
translation: Because of the light of the teaching they do not give up their armor and ride in the Great Vehicle. By the power of nonregressing zeal, by the faculty of being without forgetfulness, and by the power of continuous intellect.

source_sentence: 速能成就法界理趣分明善巧，往詣道場轉于法輪，為諸眾生演說法故，
translation: They are able to quickly perfect knowledge of the realm of reality, their understanding of principles and patterns of dharmas; they go to the terrace of enlightenment in order to teach the Dharma for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 一切眾生如其所願，如其發趣解脫生死。
translation: All sentient beings are freed from birth and death according to their wishes and give rise to liberation according to their destinies.

translation: Enlightening beings are able to decide For their own benefit and others’ benefit.

source_sentence: 以善精進力，　　堅固無退轉。
translation: By the power of good effort They are firm and unshakable.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊而說偈言：「復次無邊慧！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke a verse, saying, Furthermore, Boundless Wisdom!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於無量劫荷諸重擔被大甲冑，如是甲冑，若魔、若魔眷屬、或魔使者，
translation: “For immeasurable kalpas, the great bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas carry heavy burdens covered with great armor for an immeasurable number of kalpas.

source_sentence: 及行邪見稠林惡磧諸眾生等所不能見。
translation: They also practice wrong views that are not seen by sentient beings in dense forests and bad deserts.

source_sentence: 何以故，無有形色不可示現，無對無相捨相離相無名字故。
translation: Why is it that there are no forms and forms that can't be shown, and there are no opposites or signless forms that abandon characteristics and have no names apart from characteristics?

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 假使飛箭量如須彌，攢鋒激射無能中者。
translation: Suppose a flying arrow is the size of a mountain, and there's no one who can hit it with a sharp arrow at its tip.

source_sentence: 設以三千大千世界所有眾生一一為魔，各有若干魔軍眷屬，競共俱時發諸利箭，
translation: Suppose all the sentient beings in one of the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds were to be demons, each with several armies of demons and retinues, who would simultaneously fire sharp arrows at the same time.

source_sentence: 亦如須彌彼終不能壞。
translation: It's also like Mount Sumeru, which never breaks down.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩如是甲冑，乃至不能損一毛端。
translation: Such armor of bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas can't damage even a hairtip.

source_sentence: 於諸菩薩摩訶薩意，尚猶不能令有異念，何況身也。
translation: In the minds of the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas, they still can't cause them to have different thoughts, so why wouldn't they?

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩若以一心摧伏彼者，能令眾魔退散消滅，善能安住如是甲冑而不動搖，
translation: If great enlightening beings were to conquer them with one mind, they could cause all demons to retreat and vanish. They would be well able to abide peacefully in such armor without stirring or trembling.

source_sentence: 一切眾生無能壞者。
translation: All sentient beings are unable to destroy it.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 以無相故，非諸眾生見所行故，一切眾生不能見知。
translation: Because it has no marks, and because it's not seen by sentient beings, all sentient beings can't see or know.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩而能了知一切法故，如實知見被大甲冑，為欲救護諸眾生故。
translation: Because bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas can comprehend all dharmas, they truly know and see that they're covered with great armor in order to rescue sentient beings.

source_sentence: 於一切法無所執著，為欲饒益諸眾生故。
translation: They don't cling to all dharmas because they want to benefit sentient beings.

source_sentence: 於一切法亦無所得，是故眾生不能見知。
translation: All things are also ungraspable, so sentient beings can't see and know them.

source_sentence: 如是甲冑無有形相、無有示現、無言說故，不與色相應、不與受想行識相應，
translation: In this way, the armor is without form or characteristic marks, without any indication or explanation, because it is not associated with matter. It is not associated with feeling, perception, volition, or consciousness.

source_sentence: 不與內相應、不與外相應、不與亦內亦外相應、不與非內非外相應，不與界相應，
translation: It's not associated with the internal, not associated with the external, not associated with either the internal or the external, not associated with neither the internal nor the external, not associated with neither the internal nor the external, and not associated with the element.

source_sentence: 不與處相應。
translation: They aren't associated with the place.

source_sentence: 不與地界相應、不與水界相應、不與火風空界相應。
translation: It's not associated with the earth realm, not associated with the water realm, and not associated with the fire, wind, air, and space realms.

source_sentence: 不與欲界相應、不與色無色界相應。
translation: It's not associated with the desire realm and not associated with the form and formless realms.

source_sentence: 不與有作相應、不與無作相應、不與亦有作亦無作相應、不與非有作非無作相應。
translation: It's not associated with what's done, not associated with what's done, not associated with what's done, not associated with what's done and what's done, not associated with what's neither done nor done, and not associated with what's neither done nor done.

source_sentence: 不與聲聞地相應、不與獨覺地相應、不與佛地相應。
translation: It's not associated with the stage of śrāvaka, not associated with the stage of pratyekabuddha, and not associated with the stage of buddhahood.

source_sentence: 不與語言道相應。
translation: It's not associated with the path of language.

source_sentence: 亦不與色因相應、不與色相相應，不與受想行識因相應、不與受想行識相相應，
translation: Nor are they associated with form as cause and formlessness as characteristic. They are neither associated with feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness as cause nor with feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness as characteristic.

source_sentence: 亦不與相非相相應，亦不與一切法相應、非不相應。
translation: They aren't associated with marks or non-marks, and they aren't associated with all dharmas or not associated with them.

source_sentence: 無有繫縛，無有解脫，亦非算數譬喻可知，以一切法過諸數故。
translation: There are no fetters, no liberation, and no calculations or metaphors that can be known because all dharmas are too numerous.

source_sentence: 如是甲冑，一切法見皆不可得，色見不可得、受想行識見不可得，乃至無少法見可得。
translation: Such armor, all views of dharmas are unobtainable, views of form are unobtainable, views of feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness are unobtainable, and there's no little view of dharmas that can be obtained.

source_sentence: 如是甲冑，不與一切法相應、非不相應，不與色相應、非不相應，不與受想行識相應、非不相應。
translation: Such armor is not associated with all dharmas, not associated with or not associated with them, not associated with form and not not not not not associated with it, not associated with feelings, perceptions, volitions, and consciousnesses.

source_sentence: 於一切法若相應不相應，彼皆遠離。
translation: In all things that are associated and not associated, they're all free of them.

source_sentence: 如是甲冑，亦無有作，作者無故。
translation: Thus, there's no armor that creates anything, and the author is absent.

source_sentence: 亦無有相，相非有故。
translation: Nor does it have characteristics, because characteristics are not present.

source_sentence: 無處所相，無和合相，無有分別，無有動搖，無有攀緣，無性可見。
translation: There are no marks of location, no marks of conjunction, no distinctions, no agitation, no clinging, and no nature to be seen.

source_sentence: 被甲冑者亦不可得，如是被甲亦不可見。
translation: A person wearing armor is also unobtainable, and such a person wearing armor can't be seen.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩被甲冑時，而不見有誰為被甲、何處被甲、從何被甲，亦不見有我能被甲、我所被甲，
translation: “When great enlightening beings wear armor, they don’t see who is wearing armor, where the armor is worn, or where the armor comes from. They also don’t see that there’s a self that can wear armor and what belongs to me.

source_sentence: 亦不見有此處被甲、他處被甲，亦不見有如是被甲所為眾生，於一切法無所行故、無所有故。
translation: They don't see that there's armor here and armor elsewhere, and they don't see that there are such sentient beings who are covered with armor because all things lack action and lack existence.

source_sentence: 「諸菩薩摩訶薩被如是甲冑，則被如來所被甲冑，身不可得、心不可得、意不可得。
translation: “When bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas wear such an armor, they are wearing the armor that the Tathāgata wears, which is unobtainable in body, mind, and thought.

source_sentence: 不可得故，遠離分別。
translation: Because they are unobtainable, they're free of discrimination.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩若住少法、若得少法，現被甲冑、當被甲冑，不應說名被大甲冑。
translation: If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, abide in few dharmas and attain few dharmas, and are now wearing armor or will wear armor, they shouldn't be called wearing the great armor.

source_sentence: 若心超過，乃可說名被不思議大甲冑也。
translation: If his mind goes beyond it, then he can be called a man wearing an inconceivable great armor.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩不為少眾生故被大甲冑，亦不為一劫眾生故被大甲冑，亦不為百千劫百千俱胝劫、百千那由他俱胝劫諸眾生故被大甲冑，
translation: “Great enlightening beings don’t wear great armor for the sake of a small number of sentient beings, and they don’t wear great armor for the sake of an eon of sentient beings. Nor do they wear great armor for the sake of a hundred thousand eons or a hundred thousand cosmic ages or a hundred thousand cosmic ages of sentient beings

source_sentence: 為於無量無數劫中諸眾生故被大甲冑，是故說名被於無量大甲冑也。
translation: It's because sentient beings will be covered with great armor for measureless and countless eons, so it's called being covered with measureless great armor.

source_sentence: 「諸菩薩摩訶薩被甲冑時，被於不住眾生想甲冑，不起我想甲冑，離眾生想甲冑，
translation: “When the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas are wearing armor, they don’t conceive of armor for sentient beings who don’t abide, don’t conceive of self as armor, and conceive of armor for sentient beings as armor.

source_sentence: 滅我想甲冑，知眾生性甲冑，知我性甲冑，過想受甲冑，知一切法無作相甲冑，
translation: They are armed with the armor of annihilation of ideation of self and know the armor of sentient beings. They are armed with the armor of knowing the nature of self; they are armed with the armor of knowing the nature of self; they are armed with the armor of experiencing faulty ideas; they are armed with the armor of knowing all things as

source_sentence: 空相甲冑，無想相甲冑，無願相甲冑，知一切法無生相甲冑，無滅相甲冑，
translation: They are armed with the mark of emptiness, the mark of absence of ideation, the mark of wishlessness, and the mark of wishlessness. They know that all things have the mark of nonorigination and the mark of nonperishing as armor.

source_sentence: 知一切法差別性相甲冑，無差別性相甲冑，知一切法事相甲冑，無事相甲冑。
translation: He knows the armor of the distinctive characteristics of all dharmas and the armor of non-discriminating characteristics, and he knows the armor of the deeds and marks of all dharmas and the armor of no deeds.

source_sentence: 「無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 若住於事而被甲冑，終不說名被大甲冑。
translation: If someone abides in things and is covered with armor, they're never said to be clad in a great armor.

source_sentence: 以諸菩薩摩訶薩不住於事求大智慧，是故說為被大甲冑。」
translation: Because bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, don't abide in things and seek great wisdom, they're said to be armed with great armor.

source_sentence: 「無量千劫中，　　被大無邊甲，
translation: In the course of immeasurable thousands of koṭis of kalpas They will be covered with great, boundless armor.

source_sentence: 為欲令眾生，　　解脫諸苦惱。
translation: They want to cause sentient beings to be liberated from suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 如是大甲冑，　　若魔若魔使，
translation: Like this great armor, whether it's a demon or a demonic messenger,

source_sentence: 作諸魔業者，　　眼所不能見；
translation: They do demonic deeds that cannot be seen by the eye.

source_sentence: 及餘眾生等，　　行見稠林者，
translation: And the other sentient beings and so forth, Those who practice views of the dense forest.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　亦非彼所見。
translation: The armor is inconceivable, And not seen by anyone else.

source_sentence: 無色無形像，　　無對無相待，
translation: They are formless, formless, formless, Unresisting, without mutual dependence.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　故非眼所見。
translation: The armor is inconceivable; Therefore it cannot be seen by the eye.

source_sentence: 無名亦無相，　　遠離一切相，
translation: The absence of names and the absence of marks Is far removed from all marks.

source_sentence: 甲冑無有邊，　　故無相見者。
translation: The armor has no limit, so there's no one who sees each other.

source_sentence: 假如須彌箭，　　攢鑽來中射，
translation: Suppose there's a Sumeru arrow, which is drawn and drilled to shoot in the middle.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　令箭自摧折。
translation: The armor is inconceivable, and it causes the arrow to break itself down.

source_sentence: 世界所有魔，　　亦以須彌箭，
translation: All the demons in the world Will also use the arrow of the polar mountain.

source_sentence: 於斯大甲冑，　　競共來激射，
translation: In this great armor, they're all competing to come and shoot together.

source_sentence: 然於大甲冑，　　不損如毛端，
translation: Still, the great armor is not damaged like a hairtip.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　無能摧壞者。
translation: The armor is inconceivable, and there's no one who can destroy it.

source_sentence: 由是諸菩薩，　　身心無變異，
translation: Because of these bodhisattvas, Their bodies and minds are unchanging.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　誰能傾動者？
translation: The armor is inconceivable, Who can tilt it?

source_sentence: 若以一念心，　　摧伏諸魔眾，
translation: If you use a single thought to subdue the hosts of Māra,

source_sentence: 菩薩不思議，　　魔軍咸退散。
translation: The enlightening beings do not think: All the armies of demons have scattered away.

source_sentence: 如是大甲冑，　　未甞有動搖，
translation: Thus, the great armor is not shaken or shaken.

source_sentence: 一切諸眾生，　　而無能見者。
translation: All sentient beings Can’t see anyone.

source_sentence: 一切諸眾生，　　不知甲冑相，
translation: All sentient beings don’t know the characteristics of armor.

source_sentence: 是故諸眾生，　　眼所不能見。
translation: Therefore, sentient beings can't see it with their eyes.

source_sentence: 菩薩為依怙，　　能知一切法，
translation: Enlightening beings are their refuge, Able to know all things.

source_sentence: 猶若勝金剛，　　斯為善被者。
translation: It's like the superior adamantine, which is a good cover.

source_sentence: 不受一切法，　　救護諸眾生，
translation: Not accepting all things, they rescue sentient beings.

source_sentence: 順諸佛法故，　　斯為善被者。
translation: Because it follows the buddhas' teachings, this is a good cover.

source_sentence: 甲冑無所取，　　隨順一切法，
translation: The armor has nothing to grasp and follows all dharmas.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　斯為善被者。
translation: The armor is inconceivable, and this is a good cover.

source_sentence: 甲冑無示現，　　淨治一切法，
translation: The armor is unmanifest; It purifies all things.

source_sentence: 諸法離言說，　　無能示現者。
translation: All dharmas are apart from words, And there is no one who can show them.

source_sentence: 不與色相應，　　不與受相應，
translation: They are not associated with matter. They are not associated with sensation.

source_sentence: 不與想行識，　　相應及和合。
translation: They are not associated or conjoined with ideas, volitions, and conscious constructs.

source_sentence: 不與內相應，　　不與外相應，
translation: They are not conjoined with the internal and not conjoined with the external.

source_sentence: 不與內外俱，　　相應及和合。
translation: They are not conjoined with internal or external; they are neither associated, nor combined.

source_sentence: 不與界相應，　　不與處相應，
translation: They are not conjoined with the realm, they are not conjoined with the sphere.

source_sentence: 若界若處中，　　亦無有和合。
translation: In neither realm nor location, Nor is there any conjunction.

source_sentence: 不與地相應，　　不與水相應，
translation: They are not conjoined with the earth and not conjoined with water.

source_sentence: 不與火風空，　　相應及和合。
translation: They are not associated with fire, wind, air, space, conjoined or combined.

source_sentence: 不與欲相應，　　不與色相應，
translation: They are not associated with desire, and they are not associated with form.

source_sentence: 不與無色界，　　相應及和合。
translation: They are not associated with, or combined with the formless realm.

source_sentence: 一切無所得，　　不與諸有作，
translation: All things are ungraspable, not the same as existence.

source_sentence: 不與諸無作，　　相應及和合。
translation: They are not associated or combined with the unmanifest.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　無住無和合，
translation: The armor is inconceivable, without abiding or combining,

source_sentence: 無縛無解脫，　　亦無不相應。
translation: Neither bound, nor liberated, Nor unassociated.

source_sentence: 甲冑無邊際，　　不共聲聞地，
translation: Their armor has no bounds, Is not common to the stages of the sravakas.

source_sentence: 不共獨覺地，　　相應及和合。
translation: They are not common to the stages of pratyekabuddha, either conjoined or combined.

source_sentence: 乃至諸佛地，　　及與一切法，
translation: Up to the buddha-stage and all dharmas.

source_sentence: 一切不相應，　　一切不和合。
translation: All are not conjoined, and all are not combined.

source_sentence: 種種語言道，　　而無能及者，
translation: Various paths of various languages No one can match them.

source_sentence: 甲冑無有邊，　　無體難思故。
translation: Armor has no bounds, Because it has no body and is inconceivable.

source_sentence: 不與一切法，　　相應不相應，
translation: They are not conjoined with all dharmas, Are not conjoined with them.

source_sentence: 甲冑不思議，　　超過一切數。
translation: The armor is inconceivable, Beyond all numbers.

source_sentence: 甲冑無有上，　　無縛無非縛，
translation: The armor is unsurpassed, unfettered and not fettered.

source_sentence: 亦無有色相，　　受想行識相。
translation: Nor does it have form or formless characteristics, sensation, perception, volition, and consciousness.

source_sentence: 不與彼諸相，　　相應及和合，
translation: They are not conjoined with these characteristics, nor are they combined.

source_sentence: 不與諸法相，　　相應不相應，
translation: They are not conjoined with the characteristics of things, Are not conjoined.

source_sentence: 亦不與無相，　　相應及和合。
translation: Nor is it associated or conjoined with signlessness.

source_sentence: 甲冑無有上，　　無縛無解脫，
translation: The armor of enlightenment is unsurpassed. There is no bondage or liberation.

source_sentence: 一切諸法中，　　不墮一法數。
translation: Among all dharmas, there's not a single one that doesn't fall into the number of dharmas.

source_sentence: 一切諸法中，　　甲冑不可得，
translation: Among all dharmas, Armor is ungraspable.

source_sentence: 是故無有上，　　說名不思議。
translation: Therefore, there's nothing superior that's said to be called inconceivable.

source_sentence: 甲冑無有色，　　無受亦無想，
translation: Armor has no form, No sensation and no ideation:

source_sentence: 無行亦無識，　　非諸蘊所攝。
translation: Without formations and without consciousness, they aren't included in the aggregates.

source_sentence: 如是勇猛者，　　被斯大甲冑，
translation: Such a courageous man is clad in this great armor,

source_sentence: 身心無所得，　　不見微少法。
translation: The body and mind have nothing to attain, Yet they do not see any subtle dharmas.

source_sentence: 過諸思擇故，　　清淨心安住，
translation: Because of going beyond deliberation, The pure mind dwells peacefully.

source_sentence: 而常無怯弱，　　說名不思議。
translation: He always has no weakness, yet he says it's called inconceivable.

source_sentence: 堅固被甲冑，　　其心無所動，
translation: They are firmly armored, Their minds unshakable.

source_sentence: 不計諸劫量，　　說名不思議。
translation: They don't count the number of eons and call them inconceivable.

source_sentence: 甲冑無有量，　　不取法非法，
translation: Their armor is immeasurable, They do not take what is lawful or unlawful.

source_sentence: 以無時量故，　　說名不可量。
translation: Because time is immeasurable, They are said to be immeasurable.

source_sentence: 不起眾生想，　　亦無有我想，
translation: They don’t give rise to conceptions of sentient beings, Nor do they have any self.

source_sentence: 能知此想故，　　一切想不生。
translation: Because they can know these thoughts, All thoughts don’t arise.

source_sentence: 亦知一切法，　　此法皆無相，
translation: They also know all things. These things have no characteristics at all.

source_sentence: 如是被甲冑，　　說名不思議。
translation: Such a person wearing armor is said to be called inconceivable.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊而說偈言：「復次無邊慧！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke a verse, saying, Furthermore, Boundless Wisdom!

source_sentence: 此大甲冑名曰妙法嚴具莊嚴；
translation: This great armor is called Array of the Adornments of the Wonderful Teaching.

source_sentence: 亦名最上，不可壞故；
translation: It is also called the highest because it cannot be broken down.

source_sentence: 亦名一切法無差別，不於少法作差別故。
translation: They are also said to be without distinctions in all dharmas because they do not make distinctions among the few dharmas.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩被此甲冑，持大慧力，乘於大乘、最上之乘、無等等乘、大攝受乘、無邊攝受乘、一切眾生乘此乘者，
translation: “Great enlightening beings wearing this armor of great knowledge and holding the power of great wisdom, ride the great vehicle, the supreme vehicle, the peerless vehicle, the greatly collected vehicle, the infinitely collected vehicle, and all sentient beings who ride this vehicle.

source_sentence: 於此乘中無不容受，然於此乘不增不減，能令眾生安樂而住，亦令眾生安樂而出。
translation: In this vehicle, there's nothing to be accepted, but in this vehicle, it doesn't increase or decrease, and it can cause sentient beings to abide peacefully and emerge peacefully, and it also causes sentient beings to emerge peacefully.

source_sentence: 若有眾生乘此決定安樂乘者，無有身心疲倦勞苦。
translation: If there are sentient beings who ride this vehicle of certainty and well-being, there's no physical or mental weariness or fatigue or suffering.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 此乘映蔽一切世間天、人、阿修羅、聲聞、緣覺及餘諸乘而當出離。
translation: This vehicle reflects all the worldly gods, humans, asuras, śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, and other vehicles that will be liberated.

source_sentence: 此乘無來無去、無住無見無知，前際不可得、後際不可得、中際不可得，
translation: This vehicle has neither coming nor going, neither abiding nor seeing nor knowing. The former cannot be grasped, the latter cannot be grasped, and the middle cannot be grasped.

source_sentence: 三世平等猶如虛空不離塵染，無有相待、無有障礙亦無執著，以此乘故而當出離。
translation: The equality of the three worlds is like space that doesn't part from defilement by dust, has no mutual dependence, no obstruction, and no attachment, and will be liberated because of this vehicle.

source_sentence: 此乘無量，不可量故；
translation: This vehicle is immeasurable because it cannot be measured.

source_sentence: 本無礙相，不住相故；
translation: The primary characteristic is unobstructed, because it does not abide in characteristics.

source_sentence: 最上第一。
translation: It's the highest and first.

source_sentence: 乘此乘者無怯弱心，而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Those who ride this vehicle have no weak minds and aspire to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 此乘如燈、如日月輪，為諸眾生作大光明。
translation: This vehicle is like a lamp and like the sun and moon, producing great light for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 此之大乘亦復如是，光照三千大千世界，無能映蔽、無能障礙，能以無邊大功德海而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: This Mahayana is also like this: its light illumines the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, which are unable to overshadow or obstruct it, and it can set out for unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment by means of an infinite ocean of great virtues.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 此乘離闇，能除一切世間之病，超過一切世間之法；
translation: This vehicle, free from darkness, can remove all worldly sicknesses and transcend all worldly dharmas.

source_sentence: 攝大眾生，非諸下劣所能乘也，唯除能被大甲冑者。
translation: It's not something that lesser beings can ride, except for those who can wear a great armor.

source_sentence: 如我所說，於無量劫救護眾生，供養諸佛種種善根資糧清淨之所能乘，
translation: As I teach, for immeasurable eons they protect sentient beings and provide support to the buddhas. Their accumulation of roots of goodness is what they can ridden on in purity.

source_sentence: 聲聞緣覺及餘下劣繫縛世間、世間相應，或增上慢、慢所調伏，一切外道無信之輩，
translation: śrāvakas, pratyekbuddhas, and other inferior fetters bound to the world or associated with it, or subdued by overweening conceit and pride, all non-Buddhist people who lack faith.

source_sentence: 尚不欲聞此乘之名，何況而能乘此乘也。
translation: They still don't want to hear the name of this vehicle, so why would they be able to ride it?

source_sentence: 若有眾生遊戲不可思議境界，乘此乘已，如其勝願而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: If there are sentient beings who play in the inconceivable realm and ride this vehicle, they'll follow their superior vow and set out for unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 此乘無際，初中後際不可了知。
translation: This vehicle has no limit, and the beginning, middle, and end cannot be known.

source_sentence: 此乘際斷、際不可得，無邊際是乘際，無量際是乘際。
translation: The limits of this vehicle are cut off and ungraspable, the limitlessness is the limit of the vehicle, and the limitlessness is the limit of the vehicle.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 乘無邊際亦無中際，無有少際而可斷者。
translation: The vehicle has no limit and no middle, and there's no little limit that can be cut.

source_sentence: 言際斷者，以無少際說為際斷，不分別際說為際斷，如是名為此乘際斷。
translation: When it's called stopping at the limit, it's said to be stopped at the limit because there's no shorter limit, and it's said to be stopped at the limit without distinction, which is called stopping at the limit of this vehicle.

source_sentence: 際無所有說為中際，際無所有說為邊際，際無所有以際說之。
translation: The absence of anything at the extent is said to be the middle extent, the absence of anything at the extent is said to be the extreme extent, and the absence of anything at the extent is said to be the limit.

source_sentence: 於彼際中際不可得，不可得故邊際中際無際無斷入於際門，入際門故此乘超過，
translation: Because it is ungraspable, the extremes, the middle and the extremes have no limit. Therefore, because they are ungraspable, the extremes, the middle and the extremes have no limit; without being cut off, they enter into the gate of the extremes. Because they enter into the gate of the extremes, this vehicle transcends them.

source_sentence: 於彼超過亦無所得。
translation: Beyond that, there's nothing to be gained.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 何者為際？
translation: What's the limit?

source_sentence: 謂斷、常際。
translation: It's the limit of cessation and permanence.

source_sentence: 入語言故際則非際。
translation: Because it enters into words, the limit is not the limit.

source_sentence: 彼斷常際無有邊際，以彼際相相無邊故。
translation: Their state of cessation and permanence has no limit because the characteristics and marks of that state have no limit.

source_sentence: 所言際者無有分別，分別斷故超過於際遠離斷常。
translation: The mentioned limit has no discrimination: because it is to be abandoned through differentiating, it goes beyond the limit and is free from annihilation and permanence.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 有身見者則於際門有所依止，若無身見則於際門無所執著。
translation: If there is no belief in a self, then there is no attachment regarding the aspect of time.

source_sentence: 無執著故，於斷常際乃能超過。
translation: Because they have no attachment, they are able to transcend the realm of cessation and eternalism.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 斷常際者而無有實，但誑語言。
translation: The realm of cessation and eternalism has no reality, but it's only crude speech.

source_sentence: 於三有中分別二際，於彼二際若不攝取、若不相應，乃能超過。
translation: In the three existences, there are two kinds of distinctions: when these two kinds of distinctions are not grasped and when they are not associated, it is possible to transcend them.

source_sentence: 斷身見故，於二際門而無所執。
translation: Because they abandon belief in a self, they do not cling to the two extremes.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩摩訶薩未離身見，則不名為被大甲冑乘於大乘，於彼際門則為執著。
translation: If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas who haven't yet parted with the view of body, then they aren't called wearing a great armor and riding in the great vehicle, and they're addicted to the perspective of those at the extremes.

source_sentence: 設欲斷際起斷際想，於前後際而有分別。
translation: Suppose the perception of the cessation of desire gives rise to the conception of the cessation, and there's discrimination at the prior and subsequent ends.

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩摩訶薩已離身見，是則名為被大甲冑乘於大乘，於彼際門則無所執。
translation: If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas have parted with the view of body, then they're called wearing a great armor and riding in the great vehicle, and there's no attachment to that approach at the end.

source_sentence: 過二際已，以安樂乘而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: After passing beyond the two realms, they'll use the comfortable vehicle to set out for unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩以大慧力，能於一切住際之法不斷不破，善巧方便攝取止觀，
translation: “Great enlightening beings, by the power of great wisdom, are able not to stop or break all the principles of their abodes, skillfully and skillfully taking care of calming and insight.

source_sentence: 修習無相得無相證，則為諸佛授法光明。
translation: If someone cultivates signlessness and attains signlessness, then they'll be taught the Dharma light by the buddhas.

source_sentence: 法光明故一切際斷，於彼際斷亦無所執、無有少際於彼際門，若相應、若不相應，
translation: It is because of the light of the doctrine that all [afflictions] are to be abandoned at all extents, and there is also no attachment with respect to what is to be abandoned at these [afflictions]. There is no shortcoming [affective] aspect in relation to those [afflictions]: whether associated or not.

source_sentence: 若憶念、若不憶念，於一切法善巧方便安住止觀，便獲無邊大法光明。
translation: If he remembers or doesn't remember, skillfully and skillfully abides in calming and observing all dharmas, he'll attain the limitless great Dharma light.

source_sentence: 法光明故遠離黑闇怖畏毛竪，建大法幢、出大梵音、大師子吼，告眾生言：『汝等速來於此大乘、大安樂乘、大調御乘、大發趣乘而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。』
translation: Because of the light of the Dharma, he's far removed from the darkness and fearful hair on his hair, establishes the great banner of the Dharma, produces the great Brahma sound, and rouses the great lion to call out to sentient beings, saying, 'Come quickly to this great vehicle, great peaceful vehicle, great taming vehicle, great enlightenment vehicle, and great

source_sentence: 為諸眾生演法光明，法光明故能令眾生被大甲冑乘此大乘。
translation: For the sake of sentient beings, he teaches the light of the Dharma, and because of the light of the Dharma, he can cause sentient beings to be armed with great armor and ride this great vehicle.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於此大乘此大甲冑勿生慳悋，當願眾生發菩提心，被此甲冑乘此大乘。
translation: Bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, don't become stingy with this great armor of the great vehicle and these great armors, and may sentient beings give rise to the mind of enlightenment and ride in this great vehicle with this armor.

source_sentence: 於此大乘此大甲冑亦勿慳悋，而能展轉勸諸眾生，復願眾生被此甲冑乘此大乘而當出離。
translation: Also, don't be stingy with these great armors of the great vehicle, and don't be stingy with these great armors, but rather encourage sentient beings in turn, and may sentient beings wear these armors and ride this great vehicle to escape.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩住是行時，攝取佛國清淨佛國、攝取聲聞及諸菩薩圓滿功德，
translation: “When great enlightening beings live by these practices, they take in the buddha-lands and purify the buddha-lands; they take in the disciples and perfect virtues of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 以此無邊大功德海而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Because of this boundless ocean of great merit, he sets out for unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 此之大乘等于法界，此岸彼岸無可得者，然能運載一切眾生從此至於法界之中，
translation: This Mahayana is equal to the cosmos, but there is no shore or other shore where it can be found; yet it can carry all sentient beings from this world to the cosmos.

source_sentence: 無處相應、法界相應、甲冑相應。
translation: It's associated with no place, associated with the Dharma realm, and associated with armor.

source_sentence: 若於此乘等于法界勤修習者，而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: If someone diligently cultivates this vehicle equal to the Dharma realm, they'll then aspire to unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 譬如法界無有塵染、無能壞者、無能染者。
translation: It's like the Dharma realm that has no defilement by dust, no one who can break it down, and no one who can defile it.

source_sentence: 此之大乘亦復如是，無壞無染，無壞染故而當趣於一切智智，是故此乘說為大乘。
translation: This great vehicle is likewise, without decay or defilement, and because it's without decay or defilement, it will lead to omniscience and cognition; therefore, this vehicle is called the great vehicle.

source_sentence: 此乘無礙，一切世間天、人、阿修羅不能退轉，以無著故而當趣於一切智智，
translation: This vehicle is unobstructed. All the gods, humans, and asuras of all worlds cannot turn away from it. Because they are free from attachment, they will proceed toward omniscience.

source_sentence: 是故此乘說為大乘。
translation: Therefore, this vehicle is called the great vehicle.

source_sentence: 言大乘者，謂大莊嚴，一切莊嚴無不入此大乘中者。」
translation: When it comes to the great vehicle, it means great adornment, and there's nothing that all adornments don't enter into this great vehicle.

source_sentence: 爾時無邊慧菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Boundless Wisdom said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 於此乘中，豈有有為諸莊嚴耶？」
translation: Is there any artificial adornment in this vehicle?

source_sentence: 爾時世尊告無邊慧菩薩摩訶薩言：「如是如是。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Boundless Wisdom, saying, So it is.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 我隨世俗，於此乘中亦說一切有為莊嚴。
translation: Following the conventional, I've also explained all the adornments of conditioned things in this vehicle.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 若轉輪王、帝釋梵王，無不皆從此大乘出。
translation: None of the wheel-turning kings or Indra and Brahmā kings will emerge from this great vehicle.

source_sentence: 若已出者、若當出者，雖住轉輪、釋梵尊位，不為生死煩惱過失之所染著，
translation: Those who have emerged and those who will emerge, though they abide in the throne of the universal ruler or in the state of Sakra-brahmā, won’t be stained by the afflictive tendencies of birth and death.

source_sentence: 能於諸欲一一稱量，既稱量已則便厭捨，於出離道而能了知。
translation: He's able to weigh each of the desires, and after weighing them, then he becomes disillusioned with them, and he can know the path to escape.

source_sentence: 無邊慧！
translation: Boundless wisdom!

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩摩訶薩乘此乘者，雖受生死，於一切處不為染污，能見過患能知出離。
translation: If bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas ride this vehicle, even though they experience birth-and-death, they won't be defiled in all places, can see faults and distress, and can know escape.

source_sentence: 若我於此未說諸法及諸莊嚴，以此乘相，於彼諸法及諸莊嚴亦能了知，
translation: “If I have not explained the teachings and their adornments here, how can I know the teachings and their adornments by means of this vehicle?

source_sentence: 而發趣於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: He then sets out for unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「大乘無上乘，　　此乘不思議，
translation: “The great vehicle is the supreme vehicle, This vehicle is inconceivable.

source_sentence: 若有乘此乘，　　彼皆當出離。
translation: If someone rides this vehicle, they'll all be liberated.

source_sentence: 是大依止處，　　此乘不思議，
translation: This is the great basis. This vehicle is inconceivable.

source_sentence: 無量無邊際，　　故名為大乘。
translation: Because they are immeasurable and limitless, They are called the Great Vehicle.

source_sentence: 一切諸眾生，　　乘於此乘者，
translation: All sentient beings who ride this vehicle,

source_sentence: 此乘無有減，　　亦復無有增。
translation: This vehicle has no decrease And also no increase.

source_sentence: 一切諸眾生，　　乘於此乘者，
translation: All sentient beings who ride this vehicle,

source_sentence: 安樂而發趣，　　於中無苦惱。
translation: They give rise to an aspiration for peace and happiness, where there's no suffering or distress.

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩等，　　於此乘發趣，
translation: If bodhisattvas and so forth Aspire to this vehicle,

source_sentence: 直進無他行，　　身心不疲倦；
translation: They go straight forth without other practices, Without weariness in body or mind.

source_sentence: 照明於世間，　　天人阿修羅，
translation: It illuminates the world, gods, humans, and asuras.

source_sentence: 當於此大乘，　　無上而發趣；
translation: In this great vehicle They should set out for the supreme path.

source_sentence: 映蔽諸緣覺，　　及以聲聞乘，
translation: It's a reflection of the pratyekabuddhas and the śrāvaka vehicle.

source_sentence: 亦於此大乘，　　無上而發趣。
translation: They also set out for this great vehicle, the unsurpassed one.

source_sentence: 無來亦無去，　　無住無前際，
translation: Neither coming nor going, neither abiding nor going.

source_sentence: 後際及中際，　　無得無所見。
translation: The latter and the middle have no attainment and nothing to see.

source_sentence: 三世悉平等，　　猶若淨虛空，
translation: The three worlds are all equal, just as if they were pure space.

source_sentence: 此乘亦如是，　　遠離諸煩惱。
translation: This vehicle is also like this, Being far removed from all afflictions.

source_sentence: 此乘無相待，　　無障無罣礙，
translation: This vehicle has no mutual dependence, Is without obstruction or impediment.

source_sentence: 一切悉能救，　　所向無執著。
translation: They can save all, Yet have no attachment to what they seek.

source_sentence: 此乘無有量，　　亦無一切相，
translation: This vehicle has no measure and no all characteristics.

source_sentence: 自性不可得，　　無畏不思議。
translation: Their self-nature is ungraspable, And their fearlessness is inconceivable.

source_sentence: 若有乘此乘，　　得無所畏者，
translation: If there is anyone who rides this vehicle And attains fearlessness,

source_sentence: 乃於佛法中，　　無障無罣礙。
translation: In the Buddha's teaching, there are no hindrances or obstructions.

source_sentence: 以此乘發趣，　　普明於世間，
translation: With this vehicle they set out for enlightenment, Illumining the world everywhere.

source_sentence: 如日百千光，　　無時而不照。
translation: It's like the sun with a hundred thousand rays of light that don't shine at any time.

source_sentence: 此乘不可壞，　　無能映蔽者，
translation: This vehicle cannot be destroyed; There is no one who can overshadow it.

source_sentence: 無量德資糧，　　無上而發趣。
translation: Measureless is the accumulation of virtue, which gives rise to the unsurpassed destinies.

source_sentence: 此乘超世間，　　出過於三界，
translation: This vehicle transcends the world and goes beyond the three realms.

source_sentence: 遠離諸黑闇，　　能趣於無漏。
translation: Being far removed from darkness, he's able to go to the uncontaminated.

source_sentence: 此乘唯攝取，　　一切諸菩薩，
translation: This vehicle only embraces all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 其餘眾生類，　　於中不容受。
translation: The other kinds of sentient beings aren't allowed to accept it.

source_sentence: 若有智慧者，　　無量千劫中，
translation: If there's anyone with wisdom, During measureless thousands of eons,

source_sentence: 方便勤修習，　　乃乘於此乘；
translation: Because they diligently practice skillful means, They ride this vehicle.

source_sentence: 非諸聲聞眾，　　及以諸緣覺，
translation: It's not for the sake of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, nor for the sake of pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 一切外道輩，　　而能乘此乘。
translation: All the non-Buddhist sects Will be able to ride this vehicle.

source_sentence: 若有諸眾生，　　趣於非道者，
translation: If there are sentient beings who are headed for the wrong path,

source_sentence: 斯人尠福德，　　不堪聞此乘。
translation: Such people are unworthy of virtue, and they can't hear this vehicle.

source_sentence: 若有諸眾生，　　於不思議法，
translation: If there are sentient beings who don’t understand the inconceivable truth,

source_sentence: 善巧而遊戲，　　安住於此乘，
translation: They skillfully play and abide in this vehicle.

source_sentence: 隨其所建立，　　殊勝之誓願，
translation: Whatever they establish, Their supreme vows will be fulfilled.

source_sentence: 住斯正道中，　　無上而發趣。
translation: Abiding in this true path, they're unsurpassed and give rise to the destinies.

source_sentence: 此乘無邊際，　　亦無有中際，
translation: This vehicle has no bounds, And also no middle or middle:

source_sentence: 邊際及中際，　　一切不可得。
translation: The extremes and the intermediate extremes Are all ungraspable.

source_sentence: 以際不可得，　　此乘無有際，
translation: Because the limit is ungraspable, this vehicle has no limit.

source_sentence: 一切際斷故，　　安樂而發趣。
translation: Because all things are cut off at all times, they're peaceful and give rise to destinies.

source_sentence: 此乘無邊際，　　無邊是乘際，
translation: This vehicle has no bounds. Boundless is the limit of the vehicle.

source_sentence: 此乘無量際，　　無量是乘際。
translation: This vehicle has measureless limits, And immeasurable is the limit of the vehicle.

source_sentence: 此乘無際斷，　　無際為際斷，
translation: This vehicle is to be abandoned without limit, and the absence of limit is to be abandoned.

source_sentence: 於際不分別，　　斷亦不可得。
translation: They don't discriminate between the extremes, and they can't be cut off either.

source_sentence: 乘際無邊際，　　亦無有中際，
translation: The extent of the vehicle has no bounds, Nor does it have any middle extent.

source_sentence: 亦無無際際，　　際性無所有。
translation: Nor is there an infinity of anything, The nature of infinity has no existence.

source_sentence: 於際無際相，　　非際為際相，
translation: The characteristic of infinity is the characteristic of finitude, and the characteristic of infinity is the characteristic of infinity.

source_sentence: 於彼諸際中，　　際相無所有。
translation: Among those extremes, the characteristic of extremes has no existence.

source_sentence: 非際說際門，　　此乘已超過，
translation: This vehicle has already gone beyond the bounds.

source_sentence: 於彼所過量，　　相應不可得。
translation: What's associated with them is unobtainable in terms of their faults.

source_sentence: 我說斷常際，　　有邊無邊際，
translation: I teach that the realm of annihilation and eternalism has a limit and no limit.

source_sentence: 如是一切際，　　彼際悉非際。
translation: Such are all the extents; Their extent is not the extent at all.

source_sentence: 一切際無邊，　　際相無所有，
translation: All things have no bounds, And their extent and characteristics have no existence.

source_sentence: 一切際自性，　　於中不分別。
translation: The inherent nature of all things Is not discriminated in them.

source_sentence: 如是諸際中，　　以斷於分別，
translation: Thus, in all these kinds of moments, By eliminating discrimination,

source_sentence: 邊際無邊際，　　一切悉能斷。
translation: Boundless and boundless, They can cut off all.

source_sentence: 若有有身見，　　則說諸際門，
translation: If there is a belief in a self, Then we speak of the bounds.

source_sentence: 執著此諸際，　　為無依怙者。
translation: They cling to these realms Because they have no support.

source_sentence: 若無有身見，　　不著諸際門，
translation: If there’s no view of a body, They don’t cling to the extremes.

source_sentence: 不執一切際，　　為能照明者。
translation: They don't cling to all realms, but are able to illuminate them.

source_sentence: 一切際非際，　　諸際非真實，
translation: All things have limits and no limits, Their limits are not real.

source_sentence: 一切際性相，　　彼皆無所有。
translation: The nature and characteristics of all realms Have no existence at all.

source_sentence: 不受一切際，　　於際悉超過，
translation: They do not experience all realms, Yet transcend all realms.

source_sentence: 不著諸際門，　　能斷有身見。
translation: They don't cling to the gates of all realms, and they can cut off the view that there's a body.

source_sentence: 若於有身見，　　不斷不遠離，
translation: If someone has a view of the body, They won’t stop or part from it.

source_sentence: 不被大甲冑，　　不乘於大乘。
translation: They won't be armed with great armor and won't ride the great vehicle.

source_sentence: 以受於諸際，　　分別諸際相，
translation: By feeling the various realms, They discriminate the characteristics of the realms.

source_sentence: 前際及後際，　　一切皆分別。
translation: The past and future are all discriminated.

source_sentence: 若於有身見，　　一切已能斷，
translation: If there’s a view of the body, it’s already possible to stop everything.

source_sentence: 乃被無邊甲，　　乘於無上乘。
translation: He's wearing limitless armor and riding the unsurpassed vehicle.

source_sentence: 不著諸際門，　　為世智慧者，
translation: They do not cling to extremes, For the sake of worldly wisdom.

source_sentence: 能於種種際，　　一切悉超過。
translation: They are able to transcend all kinds of distinctions.

source_sentence: 由是佛法中，　　安樂而發趣，
translation: Because of this, in the Buddha’s doctrine there is a sense of well-being and an aspiration for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 菩薩善觀察，　　能以大慧力。
translation: Enlightening beings observe well And are able to use the power of great wisdom.

source_sentence: 不得少有法，　　可斷可除滅，
translation: There is not a single thing that can be abandoned or eradicated.

source_sentence: 常以善方便，　　善攝於止觀。
translation: He always uses good skillful means to skillfully gather calmness and insight.

source_sentence: 一相了知故，　　諸相皆了知，
translation: Because they know one characteristic, They know all characteristics.

source_sentence: 安住於正法，　　得大法光明。
translation: Abiding in the true teaching, they attain the great light of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 以是法光明，　　決了彼諸際，
translation: Because of the light of this teaching, They clearly perceive all realms.

source_sentence: 不見少有際，　　若際及非際。
translation: They do not see that there is a little bit of existence, That which has an end and what does not have an end.

source_sentence: 於彼可相應，　　一切無所著，
translation: They can be associated with them, Without any attachment whatsoever.

source_sentence: 若見苦眾生，　　慰諭而告言：
translation: If they see painful sentient beings, They comfort and admonish them, saying:

source_sentence: 『汝來於此乘，　　安樂而出離。』
translation: 'Come to this vehicle, be comfortable and leave it.'

source_sentence: 一切受生處，　　能作法光明，
translation: All the places where sentient beings are born can produce the light of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 被甲乘大乘，　　亦以此開示。
translation: Being endowed with the great vehicle of the armor-vehicle, he also reveals it here.

source_sentence: 此乘此甲冑，　　於彼勿慳悋，
translation: This vehicle and this armor, don’t be stingy with them.

source_sentence: 亦令諸眾生，　　被甲乘大乘，
translation: It will also cause all sentient beings To be armed with the great vehicle of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 乘此安樂乘，　　無上而發趣。
translation: He rides this peaceful vehicle, unsurpassed, and sets out for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如是諸菩薩，　　安住此修行，
translation: Thus, these bodhisattvas Abide in this practice.

source_sentence: 能於佛法中，　　以速而發趣。
translation: They can quickly set out for the path in the Buddha’s teaching.

source_sentence: 清淨佛國土，　　攝受諸聲聞，
translation: The pure buddha-lands receive all the śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 及諸菩薩等，　　功德莊嚴事。
translation: And the adornments of bodhisattvas and so forth, such as their merits.
